languages.text: Во время боя атаки врагов могут пробить щиты и повредить ваш корабль. Эти повреждения остаются после боя и требуют ремонта. Откройте меню управления кораблем, используя сервисное меню {console_bind|RightBottom}, чтобы починить корабль .

Enemy attacks can penetrate your {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} your ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}. This damage remains after the battle is over and must be repaired. Open the voidship management screen from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} to make repairs to your ship.
languages.original_text: Во время боя атаки врагов могут пробить щиты и повредить ваш корабль. Эти повреждения остаются после боя и требуют ремонта. Откройте меню управления кораблем, используя сервисное меню {console_bind|RightBottom}, чтобы починить корабль .

traits.locale_text: Enemy attacks can penetrate your shields and damage your ship's hull. This damage remains after the battle is over and needs to be repaired. Open the voidship management screen from the service menu {console_bind|RightBottom} to make repairs to your ship.

Enemy attacks can penetrate your shields and damage your ship's hull. This damage remains after the battle is over and needs to be repaired. Open the voidship management screen from the service menu {console_bind|RightBottom} to make repairs to your ship.

Enemy attacks can penetrate your shields and damage your ship's hull. This damage remains after the battle is over and must to be repaired. Open the voidship management screen from quick-access {console_bind|RightBottom} to make repairs to your ship.

Enemy attacks can penetrate your {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} your ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}. This damage remains after the battle is over and must be repaired. Open the voidship management screen from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} to make repairs to your ship.

Enemy attacks can penetrate your {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} your ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}. This damage remains after the battle is over and must be repaired. Open the voidship management screen from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} to make repairs to your ship.

languages.text: Los ataques enemigos pueden atravesar tus {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}escudos{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dañar{/g} el {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}casco{/g} de tu nave. Este daño permanece tras la batalla y es necesario repararlo. Abre la pantalla de gestión de la nave del vacío desde el acceso rápido {console_bind|RightBottom} para reparar tu nave.
languages.original_text: Enemy attacks can penetrate your {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} your ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}. This damage remains after the battle is over and must be repaired. Open the voidship management screen from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} to make repairs to your ship.

traits.locale_text: Los ataques enemigos pueden atravesar tus escudos y dañar el {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}casco{/g} de tu nave. Este daño permanece tras la batalla y es necesario repararlo. Abre la pantalla de gestión de la nave del vacío desde el acceso rápido {console_bind|RightBottom} para reparar tu nave.

languages.text: 敵の攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}シールド{/g}を貫通し、{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}船体{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。このダメージは戦いが終わっても残るため、修復しなければならない。クイックアクセス{console_bind|RightBottom}からヴォイドシップ管理画面を開き、船の修理を行おう。
languages.original_text: Enemy attacks can penetrate your {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} your ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}. This damage remains after the battle is over and must be repaired. Open the voidship management screen from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} to make repairs to your ship.

traits.locale_text: 敵の攻撃はシールドを貫通し、{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}船体{/g}にダメージを与える。このダメージは戦いが終わっても残るため、修復しなければならない。クイックアクセス{console_bind|RightBottom}からヴォイドシップ管理画面を開き、船の修理を行う。

languages.text: 敌人的攻击可能会击破虚空舰的{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}护盾{/g}，对{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体{/g}造成损害。舰体承受的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}在战斗结束后依然存在，必须进行修复。您可以按下{console_bind|RightBottom}打开快速访问菜单，进入虚空舰管理界面，对您的舰船进行修理。
languages.original_text: Enemy attacks can penetrate your {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} your ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}. This damage remains after the battle is over and must be repaired. Open the voidship management screen from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} to make repairs to your ship.

traits.locale_text: 敌人的攻击可能会击破虚空舰的护盾，对{g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}舰体{/g}造成损害。舰体承受的损害在战斗结束后依然存在，必须进行修复。您可以按下{console_bind|RightBottom}打开快速访问菜单，进入虚空舰管理界面，对您的舰船进行修理。

languages.text: Die Angriffe der Gegner können deine {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}Schilde{/g} durchdringen und den {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}Rumpf{/g} deines Schiffes {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}beschädigen{/g}. Dieser Schaden bleibt auch nach dem Kampf bestehen und muss repariert werden. Öffne den Raumschiffverwaltungs-Bildschirm über den Schnellzugriff {console_bind|RightBottom}, um Reparaturen an deinem Schiff vorzunehmen.
languages.original_text: Enemy attacks can penetrate your {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} your ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}. This damage remains after the battle is over and must be repaired. Open the voidship management screen from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} to make repairs to your ship.

traits.locale_text: Die Angriffe der Gegner können deine Schilde durchdringen und den {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}Rumpf{/g} deines Schiffes beschädigen. Dieser Schaden bleibt auch nach dem Kampf bestehen und muss repariert werden. Öffne den Raumschiffverwaltungs-Bildschirm über den Schnellzugriff {console_bind|RightBottom}, um Reparaturen an deinem Schiff vorzunehmen.

languages.text: Les attaques ennemies peuvent pénétrer vos {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}boucliers{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}endommager{/g} la {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}coque{/g} de votre vaisseau. Ces dégâts perdurent au-delà du combat et doivent être réparés. Ouvrez l'écran de gestion du vaisseau spatial via l'accès rapide {console_bind|RightBottom} pour procéder aux réparations.
languages.original_text: Enemy attacks can penetrate your {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} your ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}. This damage remains after the battle is over and must be repaired. Open the voidship management screen from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} to make repairs to your ship.

traits.locale_text: Les attaques ennemies peuvent pénétrer vos boucliers et endommager la {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}coque{/g} de votre vaisseau. Ces dégâts perdurent au-delà du combat et doivent être réparés. Ouvrez l'écran de gestion du vaisseau à partir de l'accès rapide {console_bind|RightBottom} pour effectuer des réparations sur votre vaisseau.

languages.text: Düşman saldırıları, {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}kalkanını{/g} delip geminin {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}gövdesine{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verebilir. Bu hasar, çatışma bittikten sonra da kalır ve onarılması gerekir. Geminde onarım yapabilmek için hızlı erişimden {console_bind|RightBottom} uçsuz gemisi yönetimi ekranını aç.
languages.original_text: Enemy attacks can penetrate your {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} your ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}. This damage remains after the battle is over and must be repaired. Open the voidship management screen from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} to make repairs to your ship.
